title: What are the basic techniques of photography? - Quora

response.answer_text: Photography is something that everybody likes. Some of us make it our career option also and become a photographer. But it really doesn't matter if you are a professional photographer or an ordinary person who loves to take pictures. Here are some techniques of photography. These techniques will help not only professional photographers but everybody as well. It is very important to understand the importance of technical stuff while taking pictures.Take pictures at the highest resolution and never forget to use the finest options if possible. Digital cameras use JPEG formats but if you don’t want to lose any image then go for TIFF or RAW.Instead of using the automatic mode, prefer manual settings. Keep the aperture and shutter should be linked.To know more techniques, click on this link.
